data.message: Good morning fb friends , today is Monday Nov. 15th. It is cloudy and over cast , but non the less ,a beautiful day. Because God has blessed. Us to see this brand new day. To be of service to Him. God  please use me today  to share your love to brighten  the life of  someone  who is lonely ad without hope jn this dark world of sin heat ache , disappointment and pain.  GOd  loves  FRIEND.
